name: Museum Cafe
description: A chic, minimalist cafe attached to the Hill Valley Museum of Art. The menu is projected onto your table, offering a variety of overpriced and underwhelming food. A robotic barista, with a surprisingly judgmental tone, takes your order. The air is thick with the scent of burnt coffee and the faint, almost imperceptible, hum of the museum's climate control. It's a place where you can get a lukewarm latte and a stale pastry, all while contemplating the profound emptiness of modern art.
